experience.title: Software Developer/Frontend Developer
info: Implemented an archive loan application at the Direction Générale des Affaires Intérieures et des Cultes, Benin(e-DAIC)
Implemented a project management and monitoring web application for the Ministry of Social Affairs and Microfinance, Benin
Analyzed and developed a desktop application for managing stock operations

experience.title: Frontend Developer/Software Support Engineer
info: Developed some additional features on the customer complaint management application of the RightDesk Frontend project
Implemented a webform to create a new ticket
Developed  a PWA  to display statistical charts of RightCom applications (Project Status Page)
Developed a new version of the RightQ v2, queue management application (micro-Frontend architecture)
Identified  root causes and proposed solutions to applications bugs
Used JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL and Python to solve critical customer technical problems

experience.title: Frontend Developer
info: Developing  a web portal accessible by the Congolese population for a better visibility of the Global Effective Rates applied by financial institutions
Implementing a web platform for the supervision of the application of the global effective rates of financial institutions subject to the Central Bank of Congo
Implementation of a web platform presenting DMD's solutions.
